entry.title: DNS Service Outage - Global
entry.content:
Resolved - The DNS service outage has been resolved. All services are now operating normally.

Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Investigating - We are investigating reports of DNS resolution failures affecting multiple regions including Europe, North America, and Asia Pacific.

entry.title: CDN Performance Issues - European Datacenters
entry.content:
Resolved - CDN performance has returned to normal levels across all European datacenters.

Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Identified - We have identified the cause of performance degradation in our European CDN nodes and are implementing a fix.
